name: slicerator
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.9.8" %}

package:
    name: slicerator
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: slicerator-v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/soft-matter/slicerator/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 5f2622aa4fa59b4e41434342780af64220f39c25a99db95967e915f4e624e465

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
        - six

    run:
        - python
        - six

test:
    imports:
        - slicerator
    requires:
        - nose
        - six
        - numpy
    commands:
        - python {{ environ.SRC_DIR }}/tests.py -vs

about:
    home: http://github.com/soft-matter/slicerator
    license: BSD 3-Clause
    summary: 'A lazy-loading, fancy-sliceable iterable.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - danielballan
        - ericdill
        - licode
        - tacaswell
        - caspervdw
